org.argus.sms.app.fragment

Class AbstractFragmentSend

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.argus.sms.app.fragment.AbstractFragment
      • org.argus.sms.app.fragment.AbstractFragmentSend
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.support.v4.app.LoaderManager.LoaderCallbacks<Cursor>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractFragmentReport, FragmentAlert

    public abstract class AbstractFragmentSend
extends AbstractFragment
implements android.support.v4.app.LoaderManager.LoaderCallbacks<Cursor>
    Abstract fragment for all fragments with a send button Created by Olivier Goutet. Openium 2014
